problem: Find the distance between A(2,0) and B(5,4)?

Simplify the expression 1+2+3?

There is a line L of which the standard form is x-y-1=0. 1) What is the relation between C and L? 2) If they intersect at two points, what are the value of two intersect points coordinates? 3) Find the distance between the center of circle CP and line L?

There is a line L of which the standard form is x-y-1=0. 1) What is the relation between C and L? 2) If they intersect at two points, what are the value of two intersect points coordinates? 3) Find the distance between the center of circle CP and line L?
